tab1.text1:
All rules must be followed.They are subject to change at any time.
3 Warns = 1 Week ban.

1.1 Multiple accounts and cheating will lead you to a permaban without any warning.
*Permanent ban on all clusters

1.2 Admins are not forced to return items or lost dinos due to in-game situations, bugs or rollbacks.

1.3 Mass breeding is forbidden to avoid server lags.
*Dinos wipe & warn.

1.4 Along with last rule, useless dinos must be stored in cryofridge.
*Dinos wipe & warn.

1.5 Teaming is not allowed. Only trades between tribes are allowed.
*Warn.

1.6 You must be fair with new players. Raiding a wooden or stone base won't gain you anything, except their leaving.
*Warn

1.7 Harassment, racism, hate speech or any king of discriminatory speech will be severly punished.
Warn/Ban

1.8 Do bosses at your own risk! Arenas are buggy, lost items & dinos are not covered.

1.9 Lost items during transfers will not be covered! Do not move during the cooldown before server restarts.
tab1.text2:
Admins will structure wipe and warn if these rules are not followed.

<TextStyle.Red>2.1 Banned locations</>
General : Obelisks, player spawns and ressources spots.
The Center : Ice Palace & Jumping Puzzle.
The Island : Swamp Cave, Tek Cave & Volcano.
Scorched Earth : Wyvern trench.

2.2 Ratholes are only allowed if you get in through normal movement. (crouching and probing).
*Exploits by grapple, KO, beds, tek... are forbidden.

2.3 Max base limit is 2 per cluster, to let other players find a base spot.

2.4 Do not use tunnels/structures, walls and ceilings to bypass turrets.

2.5  Random placed turrets, floating turrets and floating structures are forbidden.

2.6 All forgotten structures and dinos including Fobs and tame traps will be wiped by admins.

2.7 Any type of meshing is forbidden : Mesh biting, structures through walls...

tab2.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>Casino Location: Only Island servers [90.0/90.0]</>

3.1 Any killing inside, and in the range of Casino is forbidden.

3.2 Admins will wipe sleeping players & forgotten dinos inside and in the range of Casino.

3.3 Your dinos must be parked in DinoParking, they are forbidden inside Casino.

3.4 Coins are not made to be traded with other players. Let new players gamble in Casino and do not stalk them to take their starter coins.

3.5 Do not transfer coins from Island to other maps or they will disappear!.

3.6 Admins will not teleport you in Casino, there are teleporters on Obelisks (Unlocked lvl 50)

Get coins by selling alpha tributes at Casino, winning events or by buying them in Store.
tab2.text2:
4.1 All payments are final and non-refundable.

4.2 Attempting a chargeback or opening a PayPal dispute will result in permanent and irreversible banishment from all of our servers.

4.3 Along with server rules (1.2), admins are not forced to return any bought items lost due to in-game situations, bugs or rollbacks.

4.4 You will not keep any of your digital purchases if a server wipes, except if you did not claimed your items during last wipe.

4.5 We reserve the rights to refuse a refund if you are banned from the servers for rule breaking. You need to apply the rules like everyone.

By purchasing, you further agree our Webstore TOS & Privacy Policy.

If you want to make a custom order, please create a ticket on Discord.

tab3.title1: How to register in-game account to Discord?
tab3.text1:
<TextStyle.Red>You must register in order to claim your kits.</>

<TextStyle.LightBlue>ASA-BOT</>
● Type /registerme in discord to get your 6 digit code.
● Craft in-game ASA-BOT note. (unlocked lvl 1)
● Consume it, then a panel will appear.
● Enter the 6 digit code then click Confirm.

Claim your starter kits on Discord Starter Kits category (2man & 4man channels).

There is one kit per map, useable once per wipe.
Multiple accounts will be permanently banned.
You need to be in-game on the right server, depending on the kit you selected in order claim them.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Why I can't use/see ASA-BOT note engram?</>
● Uninstall ASA-Bot Companion mod.
● Restart game.
● Join server.

tab4.text1:
ORP structure is unlocked at level 20 and is made in your inventory.
This is not a 100% offline protection.

Once placed, ORP will automatically activate after 30 minutes when the last tribe member log off from the server.
Structures and dinos within the radius will have a 4x resistance buff and 3x turret damage buff.

Combat logging prevented : If an enemy is inside the ORP radius, buffs wont be applied.
It will display a message saying you are preventing the ORP activation. If enemy leaves, it will activate.

The ORP structure can easily be destroyed, place it wisely. You can display the protection range by using the radial menu.
All players can see the dome when you show its range. The dome is not necessary to make ORP work, it is only visual.

When a member logs on, buffs are removed from structures & turrets.

If no tribe member logs in within 48 hours, ORP structure will be destroyed, removing structure resistance buff and turrets damage buff.

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Why I can't place/see ORP engram?</>
● Uninstall Hyper's Offline Raid Protection.
● Restart game.
● Join server.

tab5.text1:

<TextStyle.LightBlue>Discover other rewards by looting drops!</>
